text: The McDouble is a hamburger sold by the fast-food restaurant chain McDonald's. It is like the double cheeseburger, with only one slice of cheese placed between the two beef patties. It was introduced in 1997. It is one of the cheapest products sold by the company. It is also said that people would buy the McDouble rather than buying the Big Mac. ==References== Category:McDonald's foods Category:Hamburgers
title: McDouble
